title: The Ballad of Buster Scruggs
regex: \b((?!\bBallad\ of\ Buster\ Scruggs:)Ballad\ of\ Buster\ Scruggs)(?!\:)(?!'t)\b
characters: "['Buster Scruggs (segment ""The Ballad of Buster Scruggs"")', 'The Kid (segment ""The Ballad of Buster Scruggs"")', 'Surly Joe (segment ""The Ballad of Buster Scruggs"")', 'Curly Joe\'s Brother (segment ""The Ballad of Buster Scruggs"")']"
